metadata.title: Infectious MERS-CoV Isolated From a Mildly Ill Patient, Saudi Arabia

abstract.original_text: Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) is associated with a wide range of clinical presentations, from asymptomatic or mildly ill to severe respiratory illness including death. We describe isolation of infectious MERS-CoV from the upper respiratory tract of a mildly ill 27-year-old female in Saudi Arabia 15 days after illness onset.

sentences.segment_text: Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus ( MERS-CoV ) is associated with a wide range of clinical presentations ,
from asymptomatic or mildly ill to severe respiratory illness including death .
We describe isolation of infectious MERS-CoV from the upper respiratory tract of a mildly ill 27-year-old female in Saudi Arabia 15 days after illness onset .
